Song.title: Better Is One Day
Song.copyright: Words and music by Matt Redman © 1994 Kingsway’s Thankyou Music All rights reserved. Used by permission.

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: How [E]lovely is Your dwelling place, [A2] Oh Lord Al[Bsus]mighty [E]My soul longs and even faints for [Bsus] You For [E]here my heart is satisfied, [A2] within Your pr[Bsus]esence I [E]sing beneath the shadow of Your [Bsus]wings
CHORUS: Better is [A2]one day in Your courts Better is [Bsus]one day in Your house Better is [A2]one day in Your courts Than thousands [Bsus]elsewhere, [(Repeat)] Thousands [E]elsewhere
VERSE 2: One [E]thing I ask and I would seek,[A2] to see Your [Bsus]beauty To [E]find You in the place Your glory [Bsus]dwells (repeat)
BRIDGE: [C#m7]My heart and flesh cry [Bsus]out, [A2] for You the living [Bsus]God [C#m7]Your spirit’s water [Bsus]for my [A]soul [Bsus] [C#m7]I’ve tasted and I’ve [Bsus]seen, [A2] come once again to [Bsus]me [C#m7]I will draw near to [Bsus]You, [A2] I will draw near to [F#m7]You To [Bsus]You
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 how lovely is your dwelling place oh lord almighty my soul longs and even faints for you for here my heart is satisfied within your presence i sing beneath the shadow of your wings chorus better is one day in your courts better is one day in your house better is one day in your courts than thousands elsewhere thousands elsewhere verse 2 one thing i ask and i would seek to see your beauty to find you in the place your glory dwells repeat bridge my heart and flesh cry out for you the living god your spirits water for my soul ive tasted and ive seen come once again to me i will draw near to you i will draw near to you to you

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: How [E]lovely is Your dwelling place, [A2] Oh Lord Al[Bsus]mighty [E]My soul longs and even faints for [Bsus] You For [E]here my heart is satisfied, [A2] within Your pr[Bsus]esence I [E]sing beneath the shadow of Your [Bsus]wings
CHORUS: Better is [A2]one day in Your courts Better is [Bsus]one day in Your house Better is [A2]one day in Your courts Than thousands [Bsus]elsewhere, [(Repeat)] Thousands [E]elsewhere
VERSE 2: One [E]thing I ask and I would seek,[A2] to see Your [Bsus]beauty To [E]find You in the place Your glory [Bsus]dwells (repeat)
BRIDGE 1: [C#m7]My heart and flesh cry [Bsus]out, [A2] for You the living [Bsus]God [C#m7]Your spirit’s water [Bsus]for my [A]soul [Bsus] [C#m7]I’ve tasted and I’ve [Bsus]seen, [A2] come once again to [Bsus]me [G#m7]I will draw near to You, [F#m7] I will draw near to You To [F#m7]You
{new_page} Bridge 2: Better is [A2]one day Better is [Bsus]one day Better is [A2]one day Than thousands [Bsus]elsewhere Better is [A2]one day Better is [Bsus]one day Better is [A/C#]one day in Your courts Than thousands [B/D#]elsewhere
CHORUS: Better is [A2]one day in Your courts Better is [Bsus]one day in Your house Better is [A2]one day in Your courts Than thousands [Bsus]elsewhere, [(Repeat)] Thousands [E]elsewhere
Ending: [A2 | B | A2 | B |]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 how lovely is your dwelling place oh lord almighty my soul longs and even faints for you for here my heart is satisfied within your presence i sing beneath the shadow of your wings chorus better is one day in your courts better is one day in your house better is one day in your courts than thousands elsewhere thousands elsewhere verse 2 one thing i ask and i would seek to see your beauty to find you in the place your glory dwells repeat bridge 1 my heart and flesh cry out for you the living god your spirits water for my soul ive tasted and ive seen come once again to me i will draw near to you i will draw near to you to you bridge 2 better is one day better is one day better is one day than thousands elsewhere better is one day better is one day better is one day in your courts than thousands elsewhere chorus better is one day in your courts better is one day in your house better is one day in your courts than thousands elsewhere thousands elsewhere ending
